column6: "The Man in the Pit" Wendell Rayfield's new job involves a large machine gun, a hole in the ground, Wolverine and several thousand bullets. We all know what damage Logan can do with his claws, but how dangerous can he be when all he can do is talk?
column8: | writer:Jason Aaron | penciller (cover):Howard Chaykin | colorist:Edgar Delgado | letterer:Randy Gentile
